title: At least 170 US hospitals face major flood risk. Experts say Trump is making it worse

title: Mexico's president convenes governors as death toll from torrential rains rises to 44
description: Torrential rains have claimed 44 lives across Mexico. Flooding and landslides have devastated several states. President Claudia Sheinbaum is coordinating an emergency response. Rescue operations are underway in affected areas. Many residents face water and el…

title: Death toll from flooding in Mexico rises above 60 as search expands
description: Authorities say some 100,000 homes across the region have been damaged by the torrential rains and flooding.
